name: Wild Wolf Attack Simulator 3D – Live life of an alpha and take revenge for your clan
name_original: Wild Wolf Attack Simulator 3D – Live life of an alpha and take revenge for your clan
description:
An alpha wolf left alone in the forest and hiding behinds the woods, its pack killed by the hunters!! Now the wolf is back for the revenge. Live life of an alpha wolf and help him to take revenge from hunters. Control the wolf and attack all carnivore beast animals and hunt them down. That not it your mission objective also includes killing elephants, bears, lions and hippos.

Wild wolf attack simulator is real time wildlife adventure with 15 extreme forest journeys. Live the adventures life of wolf with extreme challenges to survive and to satisfy the thirst of revenge. This animal’s simulator game provides you the real life animal’s safari which highlights the actual life of a wolf.

Features

-          15 wildlife forest journeys.
-          5 different animal categories to chase and hunt.
-          Multiple modes to match your mood.
-          Realistic city and forest environment with HD graphics.
-          Lifelike jungles background sounds.
-          Smooth and user friendly controls.
